physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient reported smoking 30 cigarettes per day and had a carbon monoxide level of 21 ppm.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After starting nicotine patch therapy, his smoking reduced to 20 cigarettes per day with a subsequent increase in carbon monoxide to 25 ppm.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient was continuously abstinent from smoking for 7 weeks after starting the nicotine patch, before relapsing.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially abstinent for 7 weeks, followed by relapse to 20 cigarettes per day.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient achieved sustained tobacco abstinence for over 3 years.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant improvement in mental status and functioning; clozapine dose reduced to 300 mg/day.
